name: aura-health

scripts.backend: cd backend && conda run -n aura python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && conda run -n aura pip install -r requirements.txt

description: AURA - Autonomous Unified Record Assistant - Healthcare AI Platform
author: AURA Team
